listitem.para: Moves the turtle along an arc (part of a circle). The arc sweeps by the amount of angle. The size of the arc is based on the radius parameter.
If the radius is 360, then ARC2 will draw an entire circle.

programlisting.userinput: ; a 3D example PERSPECTIVE REPEAT 36 [RIGHTROLL 10 ARC2 180 100 ARC2 -180 100]
